title: Alkaline keratinase from Bacillus sp. DRS4 efficiently biodegrades chicken feathers to synthesize improved keratin/bacterial nanocellulose-based bioplastics

Publication date: 30 June 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 12
